docs.snippet: The Yankees’ infield, for so long the backbone of the team, is now filled with question marks....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ infield, for so long the backbone of the team, is now filled with question marks.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees infield, for so long the backbone of the team, is now filled with question marks; infield has been reconfigured and reimagined for 2014 in a way that seems almost foreign after all those years of marquee value.

headline.main: Once Filled With Stars, Yankees Infield Now Hopes to Overachieve
headline.print_headline: Yankees Hope Their Once-Megawatt Infield Has Become a Secret Weapon

docs.snippet: “I feel brand-new,” Harvey said after 20 throws. But he acknowledged that he could not rush his recovery from Tommy John surgery....
docs.lead_paragraph: “I feel brand-new,” Harvey said after 20 throws. But he acknowledged that he could not rush his recovery from Tommy John surgery.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey tosses baseball 20 times at spring training, four months after having surgery on his right elbow; says he feels great but cannot rush his recovery.

headline.main: Mets’ Matt Harvey Tosses a Ball for the First Time Since Surgery
headline.print_headline: With First Throws Since Surgery, Harvey Feels ‘Brand New’

docs.snippet: Although some question whether racecar drivers are athletes, Johnson, the Nascar Sprint Cup champion, competes in triathlons and marathons to stay in shape....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although some question whether racecar drivers are athletes, Johnson, the Nascar Sprint Cup champion, competes in triathlons and marathons to stay in shape.
docs.abstract: Some people question whether racecar drivers are athletes; Jimmie Johnson, Nascar Sprint Cup champion, competes in triathlons and marathons to stay in shape; during an average race, Johnson’s heart will beat 140 to 150 times per minute for about four hours as he drives a racecar whose interior temperature can reach well past 100; endurance is crucial--if Johnson loses mental focus, he could hit a wall at nearly 200 miles per hour.

headline.main: Jimmie Johnson Does Triathlons, but Is He an Athlete?
headline.print_headline: Johnson Does Triathlons, but Is He an Athlete?

headline.main: Ukrainians Turn Kiev Street Into Shrine to Their Dead
